data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample BRASALT-152

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Kalk mit Sand, av. Tree height 14 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 20%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Lock. Best. /schl. drain. Boden. Kalkausblüh. , Film number: 809A
